trans-unit.source: Defines how to access a function.
For additional information about `FUNCKIND`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`FUNCKIND`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT.
trans-unit.target: 原生程式碼的 COM 方法傳回的 HRESULT 時，common language runtime 會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 對應 Hresult 和例外狀況](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The function can be accessed only through <see langword="IDispatch" />.
trans-unit.target: 函式只能透過 <see langword="IDispatch" /> 來存取。

trans-unit.source: The function is accessed by <see langword="static" /> address and takes an implicit <see langword="this" /> pointer.
trans-unit.target: 此函式是透過 <see langword="static" /> 位址來存取，並接受隱含的 <see langword="this" /> 指標。

trans-unit.source: The function is accessed through the virtual function table (VTBL), and takes an implicit <see langword="this" /> pointer.
trans-unit.target: 函式透過虛擬函式表 (Virtual Function Table，VTBL) 來存取，並接受隱含 <see langword="this" /> 指標。

trans-unit.source: The function is accessed by <see langword="static" /> address and does not take an implicit <see langword="this" /> pointer.
trans-unit.target: 此函式是透過 <see langword="static" /> 位址來存取，且不接受隱含的 <see langword="this" /> 指標。

trans-unit.source: The function is accessed in the same way as <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCKIND.FUNC_PUREVIRTUAL" />, except the function has an implementation.
trans-unit.target: 函式以與 <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCKIND.FUNC_PUREVIRTUAL" /> 相同的方式存取，但如果此函式具有實作 (Implementation) 則除外。
